questions.question: You are a student with an A1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 30 words. Describe your family.

answers.answer: I have a small family. I live with my parents and my younger brother. My father is a doctor, my mother is a teacher, and my brother is a student like me. We live in a small house in the countryside.
